statements: SELECT * FROM sales_funnel_stage
SELECT stage_name, conversion_rate FROM sales_funnel_stage WHERE stage_id = 1
SELECT stage_id, stage_name FROM sales_funnel_stage ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC
SELECT * FROM sales_funnel_stage WHERE conversion_rate < 0.5
SELECT stage_name FROM sales_funnel_stage WHERE stage_name LIKE '%stage%'
SELECT * FROM sales_funnel_stage WHERE stage_id > 3 ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC;
SELECT stage_name, conversion_rate FROM sales_funnel_stage WHERE stage_id BETWEEN 2 AND 4;
SELECT stage_name, conversion_rate FROM sales_funnel_stage WHERE stage_id = 1 OR stage_id = 3;
SELECT stage_id, stage_name FROM sales_funnel_stage WHERE conversion_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY stage_id ASC;
SELECT stage_id, stage_name, conversion_rate FROM sales_funnel_stage WHERE conversion_rate < 0.5 ORDER BY stage_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM conversion_rates;
SELECT id, stage_name, conversion_rate FROM conversion_rates;
SELECT stage_name, conversion_rate FROM conversion_rates ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC;
SELECT stage_name, conversion_rate FROM conversion_rates WHERE conversion_rate > 0.5;
SELECT stage_name, funnel_position, goal_conversion_rate FROM sales_funnel_stages;
SELECT * FROM conversion_rates WHERE conversion_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY stage_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT stage_name, conversion_rate FROM conversion_rates WHERE stage_name LIKE '%Stage%' ORDER BY conversion_rate ASC;
SELECT stage_name, funnel_position FROM sales_funnel_stages WHERE funnel_position BETWEEN 2 AND 5 ORDER BY stage_name ASC, funnel_position DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_funnel_stages WHERE goal_conversion_rate > 0.7 ORDER BY stage_id ASC;
SELECT stage_name, goal_conversion_rate FROM sales_funnel_stages JOIN conversion_rates ON sales_funnel_stages.stage_name = conversion_rates.stage_name ORDER BY goal_conversion_rate DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM stage_visits;
SELECT stage_name, visit_timestamp FROM stage_visits ORDER BY visit_timestamp DESC;
SELECT visit_id, stage_name FROM stage_visits WHERE stage_name='Checkout';
SELECT bottleneck_description FROM bottlenecks WHERE stage_name='Payment';
SELECT conversion_id, converted_at FROM conversions WHERE converted_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM stage_visits WHERE stage_name = 'Homepage' ORDER BY visit_timestamp DESC
SELECT stage_name, visit_timestamp FROM stage_visits WHERE visit_timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND visit_timestamp < '2022-12-31' ORDER BY visit_timestamp ASC
SELECT MAX(visit_timestamp) AS latest_visit FROM stage_visits
SELECT stage_visits.stage_name, bottlenecks.bottleneck_description FROM stage_visits INNER JOIN bottlenecks ON stage_visits.stage_name = bottlenecks.stage_name
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_conversions FROM conversions
SELECT * FROM sales_funnel_stage1;
SELECT id, customer_name, product_id FROM sales_funnel_stage2 WHERE conversion_status='Pending';
SELECT customer_name, product_id FROM sales_funnel_stage3 WHERE id=5;
SELECT email FROM sales_funnel_stage4 WHERE customer_name='Alice' AND conversion_status='Completed';
SELECT id, customer_name, email, product_id, conversion_status FROM sales_funnel_stage1 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, customer_name, email, product_id, conversion_status FROM sales_funnel_stage1 WHERE conversion_status = 'in_progress'
SELECT customer_name, email FROM sales_funnel_stage2 WHERE product_id = 5 ORDER BY customer_name DESC
SELECT * FROM sales_funnel_stage3 WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%'
SELECT customer_name, product_id FROM sales_funnel_stage4 WHERE conversion_status = 'completed' LIMIT 10
SELECT id, customer_name, conversion_status FROM sales_funnel_stage1 WHERE id > 100 ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT * FROM sales_funnel_stage_1;
SELECT user_id, conversion_event_time FROM sales_funnel_stage_2 WHERE email_capture_successful = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, product_page_visited FROM sales_funnel_stage_3 WHERE page_visited_event_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, add_to_cart_successful FROM sales_funnel_stage_4 WHERE cart_event_time < '2022-06-01';
SELECT user_id, purchase_completed, purchase_event_time FROM sales_funnel_stage_5 WHERE purchase_completed = TRUE ORDER BY purchase_event_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, landing_page_visited FROM sales_funnel_stage_1;
SELECT user_id, email_capture_successful FROM sales_funnel_stage_2 WHERE email_capture_successful = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, product_page_visited FROM sales_funnel_stage_3 ORDER BY page_visited_event_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, add_to_cart_successful FROM sales_funnel_stage_4 WHERE cart_event_time < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM sales_funnel_stage_5 WHERE purchase_completed = TRUE AND user_id = 123;
